name: For Another
description:
Two astronauts end up crashing on the surface of mars. It is up to you to save the only other human on the planet while also having to balance collecting and repair you ship so you can get back home. Don't think it'll be easy as there are many enemies you have to go through to get back home safely, and the journey will be rough. Fortunately, you have your pistol, at the ready.

Controls: WASD - for walking.    Left Click - to shoot.   Press E  -  For weapon equip
